member.name: T:YourNamespace.SimpleEndpoint
member.summary: Example of a simple NServiceBus endpoint using SQL Server transport.

member.name: T:YourNamespace.CustomEndpoint
member.summary: Example with custom transport options.

member.name: T:YourNamespace.OrderPlacedHandler
member.summary: Example message handler using StorageContext for database operations.

member.name: T:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.SqlServerTransportExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for configuring SQL Server transport with best practices.

member.name: M:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.SqlServerTransportExtensions.UseSqlServerTransport(NServiceBus.EndpointConfiguration,System.String,ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.SqlServerTransportOptions)
member.summary: Configures SQL Server transport with best practices including: - TransactionScope mode for transaction coordination - Automatic outbox configuration - StorageContext integration for synchronized transactions

member.name: M:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.SqlServerTransportExtensions.UseSqlServerTransport(NServiceBus.EndpointConfiguration,System.Func{System.Data.Common.DbConnection},ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.SqlServerTransportOptions)
member.summary: Configures SQL Server transport with a connection factory.
member.param: A factory function that creates database connections.

member.name: T:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.SqlServerTransportOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for SQL Server transport.

member.name: P:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.SqlServerTransportOptions.IsolationLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets the transaction isolation level. Default is ReadCommitted.

member.name: P:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.SqlServerTransportOptions.TransactionTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the transaction timeout. Default is 1 minute.

member.name: P:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.SqlServerTransportOptions.DefaultSchema
member.summary: Gets or sets the default schema for queues. If not set, uses the SQL Server default (dbo).

member.name: P:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.SqlServerTransportOptions.QueueSchemaSettings
member.summary: Gets or sets queue schema settings for multi-catalog support.

member.name: P:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.SqlServerTransportOptions.SubscriptionSettings
member.summary: Gets or sets subscription settings.

member.name: P:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.SqlServerTransportOptions.ConfigureSubscriptions
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to configure subscriptions. Default is false. Set to true if you need pub/sub capabilities.

member.name: P:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.SqlServerTransportOptions.EnableNativeDelayedDelivery
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to enable native delayed delivery. Default is true.

member.name: P:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.SqlServerTransportOptions.DelayedDeliveryTableSuffix
member.summary: Gets or sets the delayed delivery table suffix.

member.name: P:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.SqlServerTransportOptions.OutboxDeduplicationPeriod
member.summary: Gets or sets the period to keep outbox deduplication data. Default is 7 days.

member.name: T:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.QueueSchemaSettings
member.summary: Queue schema settings for multi-catalog support.

member.name: P:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.QueueSchemaSettings.QueueName
member.summary: Gets or sets the queue name.

member.name: P:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.QueueSchemaSettings.Schema
member.summary: Gets or sets the schema for the queue.

member.name: T:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.SubscriptionSettings
member.summary: Subscription settings for SQL Server transport.

member.name: P:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.SubscriptionSettings.TableName
member.summary: Gets or sets the subscription table name. Default is "SubscriptionRouting".

member.name: P:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.SubscriptionSettings.Schema
member.summary: Gets or sets the subscription table schema. Default is "dbo".

member.name: P:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.SubscriptionSettings.Catalog
member.summary: Gets or sets the subscription table catalog (database name). If null, uses the default catalog from the connection string.

member.name: P:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.SubscriptionSettings.EnableCaching
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to enable subscription caching. Default is true.

member.name: T:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.StorageContext
member.summary: Provides a synchronized storage context for NServiceBus handlers to execute database operations within the same transaction as message processing. This prevents escalation to distributed transactions.
member.remarks: StorageContext should be injected as a transient dependency in message handlers. The NServiceBus behavior () will attach the ambient database connection and transaction from the synchronized storage session.

member.name: P:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.StorageContext.Connection
member.summary: Gets the database connection. Throws if not attached by the behavior.

member.name: P:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.StorageContext.Transaction
member.summary: Gets the database transaction. Throws if not attached by the behavior.

member.name: M:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.StorageContext.Attach(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Data.IDbTransaction)
member.summary: Attaches the database connection and transaction from the NServiceBus synchronized storage session. This method is called by .

member.name: M:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.StorageContext.QueryAsync``1(System.String,System.Object,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Data.CommandType})
member.summary: Executes a query and returns the result set.

member.name: M:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.StorageContext.QuerySingleOrDefaultAsync``1(System.String,System.Object,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Data.CommandType})
member.summary: Executes a single-row query.

member.name: M:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.StorageContext.QuerySingleAsync``1(System.String,System.Object,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Data.CommandType})
member.summary: Executes a single-row query.
member.exception: Thrown when no result is found.

member.name: M:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.StorageContext.QueryFirstOrDefaultAsync``1(System.String,System.Object,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Data.CommandType})
member.summary: Executes a query and returns the first result or default.

member.name: M:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.StorageContext.QueryFirstAsync``1(System.String,System.Object,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Data.CommandType})
member.summary: Executes a query and returns the first result.
member.exception: Thrown when no result is found.

member.name: M:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.StorageContext.ExecuteAsync(System.String,System.Object,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Data.CommandType})
member.summary: Executes a command that returns no results.

member.name: M:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.StorageContext.ExecuteScalarAsync``1(System.String,System.Object,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Data.CommandType})
member.summary: Executes a command and returns a scalar value.

member.name: M:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.StorageContext.QueryMultipleAsync(System.String,System.Object,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Data.CommandType})
member.summary: Executes a query and returns multiple result sets.
member.returns: A grid reader for multiple result sets.

member.name: M:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.StorageContext.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes of the storage context. Note: Connection and Transaction are managed by NServiceBus and should not be disposed here.

member.name: M:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.StorageContext.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Disposes of resources.

member.name: T:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.StorageContextBehavior
member.summary: NServiceBus behavior that attaches the synchronized storage session's database connection and transaction to the StorageContext for use in message handlers.
member.remarks: This behavior ensures that all database operations performed through StorageContext participate in the same transaction as the NServiceBus message processing, preventing escalation to distributed transactions.

member.name: M:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.SqlServerTransport.StorageContextBehavior.Invoke(NServiceBus.Pipeline.IInvokeHandlerContext,System.Func{System.Threading.Tasks.Task})
member.summary: Invokes the behavior to attach the storage context.
member.param: The next behavior in the pipeline.
